book.synopsis: This direct follow-up to the best-selling War of Souls trilogy deals with the minotaurs, a race with which New York Times best-selling author Knaak is particularly known for. This series moves the minotaur species to the forefront of the Dragonlance world.
book.title_long: Night of Blood (Dragonlance: The Minotaur Wars, Book 1)
book.dimensions: Height: 6.89 Inches, Length: 4.19 Inches, Weight: 0.42328754304 Pounds, Width: 1 Inches
